1.title: Cruel Destiny
1.plot: Sandy, in a weakened state, is lying low in London, when she receives a cryptic invitation. Transom is tipped off to Sandy's whereabouts, and intend to smoke her out.

2.title: Your Greatest Ally
2.plot: Sandy travels to Bracknell to confront someone from her past. Frick asks Daniel for his help in tracking down Sandy.

3.title: A Legend
3.plot: A weary Sandy travels to Toronto in search of Brooklyn Cott. Jameson struggles to remain strong as his interrogation intensifies.

4.title: Tilting at Windmills
4.plot: Sandy and Cott visit an old ally who is not so willing to provide answers. Daniel and Tait are hot on their trail, trying to find answers for themselves.

5.title: Ochre
5.plot: Despite Cott's reservations, he and Sandy follow a clue to New York City. Daniel begins to question his involvement in Transom's agenda.

6.title: Operation Paperclip
6.plot: After a dangerous encounter in New York, Cott reconsiders his association with Sandy. Sandy and Cott travel to France to pursue a lead, where Sandy receives a grave warning.

7.title: Willful Blindness
7.plot: Daniel starts to believe Sandy is being set up. T.A.'s allegiance to Transom becomes unclear. Sandy's health becomes critical, and Cott must act quickly. At great risk, Daniel reaches out to Sandy.

8.title: Making Contact
8.plot: Cott makes a startling revelation about Sandy. Daniel is under pressure to reach Sandy before it's too late. The safe house is compromised, and Sandy and Cott must fight for their lives.

9.title: History Lesson
9.plot: Believing the operation has sustained a fatal blow, Duke takes desperate measures to intensify Jameson's interrogation. Daniel and Tait learn a hard truth. Sandy and Cott must part ways. Jameson's life hangs in the balance.

10.title: Cats Have These Too
10.plot: Sandy and Daniel conspire to rescue Jameson. Transom makes a bold move when Sandy and Daniel enact their plan. Duke begins to question Daniel's loyalty.

11.title: All in the Family
11.plot: Sandy, Daniel and Jameson are forced to lay low. Duke and Tait take a new approach in their surveillance. Sandy and Jameson start to connect the dots surrounding the Sunflower Noir.

12.title: We Are All Flawed
12.plot: Daniel demands answers from his grandfather about Project Transom. Sandy and Jameson travel to Ukraine and make a shocking discovery.

13.title: A Small Tragedy
13.plot: Sandy and Jameson uncover Olga Tarski's startling testimony in Pripyat. A moment of realization sparks a new plot to turn the table on Frick.

14.title: Buyer Beware
14.plot: Sandy and Jameson go to Marseille to reunite with Cott, where together, they hatch a plan to locate Frick. Daniel presses Sandy with an ultimatum.

15.title: Going... Going...
15.plot: Tension mounts as Sandy, Jameson and Cott put their plan into action. Daniel's defiance is exposed, and Duke's patience runs out.

16.title: Empty Rooms
16.plot: The plan suffers a critical setback, and Jameson and Cott are forced into a corner. Sandy travels to Coolworth in search of Frick.

17.title: A Safe Place
17.plot: Sandy finds the final piece of the puzzle, and uncovers a stunning truth about herself. Frick offers a final proposition.

18.title: A Waiting Grave
18.plot: Sandy comes face to face with Duke, and the final showdown begins.

locations: New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: Inspired by true events, Guidestones is the story of two journalism students who uncover a global conspiracy while investigating an unsolved murder. Sandy Rai (Supinder Wraich) is an exchange students from India, studying journalism at Ryerson University in Toronto, Canada. While working on a photojournalism assignment with fellow student Trevor Shale (Dan Fox), she sees a strange apparition that bears a striking resemblance to scientist Harold Glenndenning (David Fox), murdered under puzzling circumstances. Anxious to get to the bottom of the story, Sandy visit Harold's old home where she stumbles upon a strange symbol. Following this clue and others, she learns that Harold had a connection to the builders of the Georgia Guidestones, an enigmatic monument located in a farmer's field in Elbert County, Georgia. Made of granite and 20 feet tall, the structure is inscribed on eight sides with 10 guidelines or principles for rebuilding civilization after the apocalypse. Baffled, Sandy and Trevor quickly abandon their photojournalism assignment and travel to Georgia where they encounter the cryptic Guidestones. The trip only deepens the mystery around Harold's murder while presenting them with more clues to decipher and follow. Returning to Toronto, Sandy quickly discovers that the next clue in the puzzle leads her back to India. Convinced that she is about to stumble upon something big, she returns home. Little does she know that the story she uncovers will expose a hidden cabal involving some of the world's most powerful people and their plans for the destruction and reconstruction of modern global civilization.
imdb.title: Guidestones
plot: Inspired by true events, _Guidestones_ (qv) is the story of two journalism students who uncover a global conspiracy while investigating an unsolved murder. Sandy Rai (Supinder Wraich) is an exchange students from India, studying journalism at Ryerson University in Toronto, Canada. While working on a photojournalism assignment with fellow student Trevor Shale (Dan Fox), she sees a strange apparition that bears a striking resemblance to scientist Harold Glenndenning (David Fox), murdered under puzzling circumstances. Anxious to get to the bottom of the story, Sandy visit Harold's old home where she stumbles upon a strange symbol. Following this clue and others, she learns that Harold had a connection to the builders of the Georgia _Guidestones_ (qv), an enigmatic monument located in a farmer's field in Elbert County, Georgia. Made of granite and 20 feet tall, the structure is inscribed on eight sides with 10 guidelines or principles for rebuilding civilization after the apocalypse. Baffled, Sandy and Trevor quickly abandon their photojournalism assignment and travel to Georgia where they encounter the cryptic _Guidestones_ (qv). The trip only deepens the mystery around Harold's murder while presenting them with more clues to decipher and follow. Returning to Toronto, Sandy quickly discovers that the next clue in the puzzle leads her back to India. Convinced that she is about to stumble upon something big, she returns home. Little does she know that the story she uncovers will expose a hidden cabal involving some of the world's most powerful people and their plans for the destruction and reconstruction of modern global civilization.::Julie Giles
synopsis: This interactive thriller tells the story off two journalism students who uncover a global conspiracy while investigating an unsolved murder. Shot on location in Canada, the US and India, GUIDESTONES delves into the very real mystery of the Georgia Guidestones. The series is live at the URL above where you can sign up to experience the story in real-time as it unfolds. Follow the clues hidden in each episode to find additional web, multimedia content and other extras.
